title: Apple Watch Series 7 now available from Apple Refurbished Store
content:
Apple on Monday quietly started selling refurbished models of the Apple Watch Series 7 in its online store. Customers can now save up to $70 by choosing a refurbished Series 7 model compared to the retail price at the Apple Store – but not all versions are currently available.

more…

The post Apple Watch Series 7 now available from Apple Refurbished Store appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has now started selling refurbished models of the Apple Watch Series 7, which price discounts up to $70.
